00042 int CommandClose::run() {
00043   uint64_t handle;
00044   int error;
00045 
00046   if (m_args.size() != 1) {
00047     cerr << "Wrong number of arguments.  Type 'help' for usage." << endl;
00048     return -1;
00049   }
00050 
00051   if (m_args[0].second != "") {
00052     cerr << "Invalid character '=' in argument." << endl;
00053     return -1;
00054   }
00055 
00056   if (!Util::get_handle(m_args[0].first, &handle))
00057     return -1;
00058 
00059   if ((error = m_session->close(handle)) != Error::OK) {
00060     HT_ERRORF("Error executing CLOSE request - %s", Error::get_text(error));
00061   }
00062 
00063   return error;
00064 }
